page.title: 15WORKING MEN'S CLUB DOWNDERRY
page.content: THIS LARGE BUILDING BUILT IN{1890} DOMINATES THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE.IT PREDATES THE NORTH ENGLAND CLUBS OF THE SAME NAME AND HAS A DIFFERENT FUNCTION.IT IS THE{VILLAGE HALL}AND ANY ADULT MAY BECOME A MEMBER.THE HALL HAS GOOD FACILITIES FOR BADMINTON, BILLIARDS ETC.THE STAGE IS ADEQUATE FOR AMATEUR PRODUCTIONS AND MAY BE IMPROVED.BINGO IS A POPULAR WEEKLY EVENT CULMINATING IN A XMAS BONANZA, WHEN 20 TURKEYS ARE AMONG THE PRIZES. THE MONTHLY WHIST IS WELL ATTENDED,AS ARE THE OCCASIONAL (QUARTERLY) DANCES. THE CLUB RUNS MANY ANNUAL EVENTS.AMONG THESE THE CARNIVAL,THE ART SHOW,THE FLOWER SHOW,THE PLANT SALE,THE XMAS BAZAAR,THE MEMBERS'DINNER AND THE XMAS BINGO ARE SUPREME.OTHER GROUPS HIRE THE HALL FOR A WIDE RANGE OF CHARITY FUNCTIONS SUCH AS SALES, AUCTIONS COFFEE MORNINGS AND MEETINGS.
